description:
Comfortable and grippy trail shoes for mountain adventures where speed counts. The lightweight upper has Kevlar® cable wrapping and TPU rand to increase durability in high-wear areas, and the heel cup holds your foot securely on uneven terrain. The outsole is made with a super sticky compound and has grooved lugs for sure-footedness on slippery surfaces.

  • Breathable ripstop mesh upper and full TPU rand offers high abrasion resistance
  • Powertex® waterproof membrane lets you tackle wet conditions
  • Salewa 3F System connects the instep with the sole and heel for a supportive, flexible fit
  • Multi Fit Footbed+ has two interchangeable layers so you can customize the fit
  • Cleansport NXT™ natural odour control keeps your feet smelling fresh
  • Dual-density EVA midsole cushions and supports feet over tricky ground
  • Pomoca® Speed Hiker Pro outsole with S-Path technology grips wet or dry surfaces
name: Salewa Pedroc Powertex Waterproof Light Trail Shoes - Women's
